94 CameraDriver::CameraDriver( ros::NodeHandle nh, ros::NodeHandle priv_nh ) :
95  nh_(nh),
96  priv_nh_(priv_nh),
97  state_(Initial),
98  ctx_(NULL),
99  dev_(NULL),
100  devh_(NULL),
101  rgb_frame_(NULL),
102  it_(nh_),
103  config_server_(mutex_, priv_nh_),
104  config_changed_(false),
105  cinfo_manager_(nh),
106  cinfo_manager_ir_(nh),
107  cinfo_manager_depth_(nh),
108  cinfo_manager_color_(nh)
109 {
110  readConfigFromParameterServer();
111  advertiseROSTopics();
112 }
113 
114 
118 CameraDriver::~CameraDriver()
119 {
120  if ( rgb_frame_ )
121  uvc_free_frame( rgb_frame_ );
122 
123  if ( ctx_ )
124  uvc_exit( ctx_ ); // Destroys dev_, devh_, etc.
125 }

127 
131 void CameraDriver::readConfigFromParameterServer()
132 {
133  int err;
134 
135  err = priv_nh_.getParam( "camera_info_url" , camera_info_url_ );
136  err = priv_nh_.getParam( "camera_info_url_ir" , camera_info_url_ir_ );
137  err = priv_nh_.getParam( "camera_info_url_depth", camera_info_url_depth_ );
138  err = priv_nh_.getParam( "camera_info_url_color", camera_info_url_color_ );
139 }

141 
145 void CameraDriver::advertiseROSTopics()
146 {
147  // Remapping namespaces
148  ros::NodeHandle color_nh( nh_, "rgb" );
149  image_transport::ImageTransport color_it( color_nh );
150 
151  ros::NodeHandle depth_nh( nh_, "depth" );
152  image_transport::ImageTransport depth_it( depth_nh );
153 
154  ros::NodeHandle ir_nh( nh_, "ir" );
155  image_transport::ImageTransport ir_it( ir_nh );
156 
157  // Advertise Camera Pubishers
158  pub_camera_ = it_.advertiseCamera( "image_raw", 1, false );
159  pub_color_ = color_it.advertiseCamera( "image_raw", 1, false );
160  pub_depth_ = depth_it.advertiseCamera( "image_raw", 1, false );
161  pub_ir_ = ir_it.advertiseCamera( "image_raw", 1, false );
162 
163  // Set Publishers for TOF Camera Temperature
164  std::string node_name = ros::this_node::getName();
165  pub_tof_t1_ = nh_.advertise<sensor_msgs::Temperature>( node_name + "/t1", 1000 );
166  pub_tof_t2_ = nh_.advertise<sensor_msgs::Temperature>( node_name + "/t2", 1000 );
167 
168  return;
169 }
170 
171 
177 bool CameraDriver::Start()
178 {
179  uvc_error_t err;
180 
181  err = uvc_init( &ctx_, NULL );
182 
183  if ( err != UVC_SUCCESS )
184  {
185  ROS_ERROR( "ERROR: uvc_init" );
186  return false;
187  }
188 
189  state_ = Stopped;
190 
191  config_server_.setCallback( boost::bind( &CameraDriver::ReconfigureCallback, this, _1, _2 ) );
192 
193  return state_ == Running;
194 }
195 
196 
201 void CameraDriver::Stop()
202 {
203  boost::recursive_mutex::scoped_lock( mutex_ );
204 
205  if ( state_ == Running )
206  CloseCamera();
207 
208  uvc_exit( ctx_ );
209  ctx_ = NULL;
210 
211  state_ = Initial;
212 }
213 
214 
219 void CameraDriver::ReconfigureCallback( CISCameraConfig &new_config, uint32_t level )
220 {
221  boost::recursive_mutex::scoped_lock( mutex_ );
222 
223  if ( (level & ReconfigureClose) == ReconfigureClose )
224  {
225  if ( state_ == Running )
226  CloseCamera();
227  }
228 
229  if ( state_ == Stopped )
230  {
231  OpenCamera();
232  }
233 
234  if ( state_ == Running )
235  {
236  if ( new_config.depth_range != config_.depth_range )
237  {
238  setToFMode_ROSParameter( "depth_range", new_config.depth_range );
239  }
240 
241  if ( new_config.threshold != config_.threshold )
242  {
243  setToFMode_ROSParameter( "threshold", new_config.threshold );
244  }
245 
246  if ( new_config.nr_filter != config_.nr_filter )
247  {
248  setToFMode_ROSParameter( "nr_filter", new_config.nr_filter );
249  }
250 
251  if ( new_config.pulse_count != config_.pulse_count )
252  {
253  setToFMode_ROSParameter( "pulse_count", new_config.pulse_count );
254  }
255 
256  if ( new_config.ld_enable != config_.ld_enable )
257  {
258  setToFMode_ROSParameter( "ld_enable", new_config.ld_enable );
259  }
260 
261  if ( new_config.ir_gain != config_.ir_gain )
262  {
263  setToFMode_ROSParameter( "ir_gain", new_config.ir_gain );
264  }
265 
266  if ( new_config.ae_mode != config_.ae_mode )
267  {
268  setToFMode_ROSParameter( "ae_mode", new_config.ae_mode );
269  }
270 
271  if ( new_config.brightness_gain != config_.brightness_gain )
272  {
273  setToFMode_ROSParameter( "brightness_gain", new_config.brightness_gain );
274  }
275 
276  if ( new_config.exposure_time != config_.exposure_time )
277  {
278  setToFMode_ROSParameter( "exposure_time", new_config.exposure_time );
279  }
280 
281  if ( new_config.color_correction != config_.color_correction )
282  {
283  setToFMode_ROSParameter( "color_correction", new_config.color_correction );
284  }
285 
286  if ( new_config.r_gain != config_.r_gain )
287  {
288  r_gain_ = new_config.r_gain;
289  }
290  if ( new_config.g_gain != config_.g_gain )
291  {
292  g_gain_ = new_config.g_gain;
293  }
294  if ( new_config.b_gain != config_.b_gain )
295  {
296  b_gain_ = new_config.b_gain;
297  }
298  }
299 
300  config_changed_ = true;
301  config_ = new_config;
302 
303  return;
304 }
305 
306 
312 uint8_t cvtDoubleToByte( double x )
313 {
314  if ( x < 0 ) return 0;
315  else if ( 255 < x ) return 255;
316 
317  return static_cast<uint8_t>( x );
318 }
319 
329 void CameraDriver::ImageCallback( uvc_frame_t *frame )
330 {
331  ros::Time timestamp = ros::Time( frame->capture_time.tv_sec, frame->capture_time.tv_usec * 1000 );
332  if ( timestamp == ros::Time(0) )
333  {
334  timestamp = ros::Time::now();
335  }
336 
337  boost::recursive_mutex::scoped_lock(mutex_);
338 
339  if ( state_ != Running || not rgb_frame_ )
340  {
341  return;
342  }
343 
344  // Checking Depth Conversion Gain
345  if ( depth_cnv_gain_ <= 0.000001 )
346  {
347  double dcg = depth_cnv_gain_;
348  getToFDepthCnvGain( depth_cnv_gain_ );
349  ROS_WARN( "Wrong Depth Cnv Gain: %lf -> Re-get Depth Cnv Gain: %lf", dcg, depth_cnv_gain_ );
350 
351  unsigned short max_data;
352  unsigned short min_dist;
353  unsigned short max_dist;
354  getToFDepthInfo( depth_offset_, max_data, min_dist, max_dist );
355  ROS_INFO( "Get Depth Info - Offset: %d / Max Data : %d / min Distance : %d [mm] MAX Distance :%d [mm]",
356  depth_offset_, max_data, min_dist, max_dist );
357  }
358 
359  int err;
360  int frame_width = 1920;
361  int frame_height = 960;
362  int color_width = 1280;
363  double frame_rate = 30.0;
364 
365  err = priv_nh_.getParam( "width" , frame_width );
366  err = priv_nh_.getParam( "height" , frame_height );
367  err = priv_nh_.getParam( "color_width", color_width );
368 
369  sensor_msgs::Image::Ptr image( new sensor_msgs::Image() );
370  image->width = frame_width;
371  image->height = frame_height;
372  image->step = image->width * 2;
373  image->data.resize( image->step * image->height );
374 
375  sensor_msgs::Image::Ptr image_bgr8( new sensor_msgs::Image() );
376  sensor_msgs::Image::Ptr image_depth( new sensor_msgs::Image() );
377  sensor_msgs::Image::Ptr image_ir( new sensor_msgs::Image() );
378 
379  sensor_msgs::CameraInfo::Ptr cinfo( new sensor_msgs::CameraInfo( cinfo_manager_.getCameraInfo() ) );
380  sensor_msgs::CameraInfo::Ptr cinfo_ir( new sensor_msgs::CameraInfo( cinfo_manager_ir_.getCameraInfo() ) );
381  sensor_msgs::CameraInfo::Ptr cinfo_depth( new sensor_msgs::CameraInfo( cinfo_manager_depth_.getCameraInfo() ) );
382  sensor_msgs::CameraInfo::Ptr cinfo_color( new sensor_msgs::CameraInfo( cinfo_manager_color_.getCameraInfo() ) );
383 
384  std::string frame_id;
385  std::string frame_id_ir;
386  std::string frame_id_depth;
387  std::string frame_id_color;
388  err = priv_nh_.getParam( "frame_id" , frame_id );
389  err = priv_nh_.getParam( "frame_id_ir" , frame_id_ir );
390  err = priv_nh_.getParam( "frame_id_depth", frame_id_depth );
391  err = priv_nh_.getParam( "frame_id_color", frame_id_color );
392 
393  if ( frame->frame_format == UVC_FRAME_FORMAT_GRAY16 )
394  {
395  if ( frame->data_bytes != ( frame_width * frame_height * sizeof(uint16_t) ) )
396  {
397  ROS_WARN( "Image Frame: Unexpected Data Size (%ld Bytes) - Skip this frame."
398  , frame->data_bytes );
399  return;
400  }
401 
402  image->encoding = "16UC1";
403  image->step = image->width * 2;
404  image->data.resize( image->step * image->height );
405  memcpy( &(image->data[0]), frame->data, frame->data_bytes );
406 
407  uint16_t* data = reinterpret_cast<uint16_t*>( &(image->data[0]) );
408 
409  // Cropping Color Image Frame
410  int color_height = frame_height;
411 
412  uint16_t color_data[ color_width * color_height ];
413 
414  int m = 0;
415  int n = 0;
416  for ( int i=0; i < color_height; i++ )
417  {
418  m = i * frame_width;
419  n = i * color_width;
420  memcpy( &(color_data[n]), &(data[m]), color_width * sizeof(uint16_t) );
421  }
422 
423  // Converting YUV422 to BGR8
424  image_bgr8->encoding = "bgr8";
425  image_bgr8->width = color_width;
426  image_bgr8->height = color_height;
427  image_bgr8->step = image_bgr8->width * 3;
428  image_bgr8->data.resize( image_bgr8->step * image_bgr8->height );
429 
430  uint8_t *uyvy_ptr;
431  uint8_t *bgr8_ptr;
432 
433  uyvy_ptr = reinterpret_cast<uint8_t*>( &(color_data[0]) );
434  bgr8_ptr = reinterpret_cast<uint8_t*>( &(image_bgr8->data[0]) );
435 
436  double u0, y0, v0, y1;
437  double r0, g0, b0;
438 
439  int half_pixels = color_width * color_height / 2;
440  for ( int i = 0; i < half_pixels; i++ )
441  {
442  u0 = static_cast<double>( *(uyvy_ptr) );
443  y0 = static_cast<double>( *(uyvy_ptr+1) );
444  v0 = static_cast<double>( *(uyvy_ptr+2) );
445  y1 = static_cast<double>( *(uyvy_ptr+3) );
446 
447  r0 = 1.574800 * ( v0 - 128 );
448  g0 = 0.187324 * ( u0 - 128 ) - 0.468124 * ( v0 - 128 );
449  b0 = 1.855600 * ( u0 - 128 );
450 
451  *(bgr8_ptr) = cvtDoubleToByte( ( y0 + b0 ) * b_gain_ );
452  *(bgr8_ptr+1) = cvtDoubleToByte( ( y0 + g0 ) * g_gain_ );
453  *(bgr8_ptr+2) = cvtDoubleToByte( ( y0 + r0 ) * r_gain_ );
454 
455  *(bgr8_ptr+3) = cvtDoubleToByte( ( y1 + b0 ) * b_gain_ );
456  *(bgr8_ptr+4) = cvtDoubleToByte( ( y1 + g0 ) * g_gain_ );
457  *(bgr8_ptr+5) = cvtDoubleToByte( ( y1 + r0 ) * r_gain_ );
458 
459  uyvy_ptr += 4;
460  bgr8_ptr += 6;
461  }
462 
463  // Camera Info. Dynamic Reconfigure
464  bool rgb_dist_reconfig;
465  priv_nh_.getParam( "rgb_dist_reconfig", rgb_dist_reconfig );
466  if( rgb_dist_reconfig )
467  {
468  double rgb_fx, rgb_fy, rgb_cx, rgb_cy;
469  double rgb_k1, rgb_k2, rgb_k3, rgb_p1, rgb_p2;
470 
471  priv_nh_.getParam( "rgb_fx", rgb_fx );
472  priv_nh_.getParam( "rgb_fy", rgb_fy );
473  priv_nh_.getParam( "rgb_cx", rgb_cx );
474  priv_nh_.getParam( "rgb_cy", rgb_cy );
475  priv_nh_.getParam( "rgb_k1", rgb_k1 );
476  priv_nh_.getParam( "rgb_k2", rgb_k2 );
477  priv_nh_.getParam( "rgb_k3", rgb_k3 );
478  priv_nh_.getParam( "rgb_p1", rgb_p1 );
479  priv_nh_.getParam( "rgb_p2", rgb_p2 );
480 
481  cinfo_color->K[0] = rgb_fx;
482  cinfo_color->K[4] = rgb_fy;
483  cinfo_color->K[2] = rgb_cx;
484  cinfo_color->K[5] = rgb_cy;
485  cinfo_color->D[0] = rgb_k1;
486  cinfo_color->D[1] = rgb_k2;
487  cinfo_color->D[2] = rgb_p1;
488  cinfo_color->D[3] = rgb_p2;
489  cinfo_color->D[4] = rgb_k3;
490  }
491 
492  // Cropping Depth and IR Image Frame
493  int depth_width = frame_width - color_width;
494  int depth_height = frame_height / 2;
495 
496  image_depth->encoding = "16UC1";
497  image_depth->width = depth_width;
498  image_depth->height = depth_height;
499  image_depth->step = image_depth->width * 2;
500  image_depth->data.resize( image_depth->step * image_depth->height );
501 
502  uint16_t depth_data[ depth_width * depth_height ];
503 
504  image_ir->encoding = "16UC1";
505  image_ir->width = depth_width;
506  image_ir->height = depth_height;
507  image_ir->step = image_ir->width * 2;
508  image_ir->data.resize( image_ir->step * image_ir->height );
509 
510  uint16_t ir_data[ depth_width * depth_height ];
511 
512  int offset_x = color_width;
513  int offset_y = 0;
514  m = 0;
515  n = 0;
516  for ( int i=0; i < depth_height; i++ )
517  {
518  m = ( 2 * i + offset_y ) * frame_width + offset_x; // Interlace
519  n = i * depth_width;
520  memcpy( &(depth_data[n]), &(data[m]), depth_width * sizeof(uint16_t) );
521 
522  m += frame_width;
523  memcpy( &(ir_data[n]), &(data[m]), depth_width * sizeof(uint16_t) );
524  }
525 
526  // Depth Data Modification for Cartesian Coordinate System
527  double fx, fy, cx, cy;
528  double k1, k2, k3, p1, p2;
529 
530  bool ir_dist_reconfig;
531  priv_nh_.getParam( "ir_dist_reconfig", ir_dist_reconfig );
532  if( ir_dist_reconfig )
533  {
534  priv_nh_.getParam( "ir_fx", fx );
535  priv_nh_.getParam( "ir_fy", fy );
536  priv_nh_.getParam( "ir_cx", cx );
537  priv_nh_.getParam( "ir_cy", cy );
538  priv_nh_.getParam( "ir_k1", k1 );
539  priv_nh_.getParam( "ir_k2", k2 );
540  priv_nh_.getParam( "ir_k3", k3 );
541  priv_nh_.getParam( "ir_p1", p1 );
542  priv_nh_.getParam( "ir_p2", p2 );
543 
544  cinfo_ir->K[0] = fx;
545  cinfo_ir->K[4] = fy;
546  cinfo_ir->K[2] = cx;
547  cinfo_ir->K[5] = cy;
548  cinfo_ir->D[0] = k1;
549  cinfo_ir->D[1] = k2;
550  cinfo_ir->D[2] = p1;
551  cinfo_ir->D[3] = p2;
552  cinfo_ir->D[4] = k3;
553 
554  cinfo_depth->K[0] = fx;
555  cinfo_depth->K[4] = fy;
556  cinfo_depth->K[2] = cx;
557  cinfo_depth->K[5] = cy;
558  cinfo_depth->D[0] = k1;
559  cinfo_depth->D[1] = k2;
560  cinfo_depth->D[2] = p1;
561  cinfo_depth->D[3] = p2;
562  cinfo_depth->D[4] = k3;
563  }
564  else
565  {
566  fx = cinfo_depth->K[0];
567  fy = cinfo_depth->K[4];
568  cx = cinfo_depth->K[2];
569  cy = cinfo_depth->K[5];
570  k1 = cinfo_depth->D[0];
571  k2 = cinfo_depth->D[1];
572  k3 = cinfo_depth->D[4];
573  p1 = cinfo_depth->D[2];
574  p2 = cinfo_depth->D[3];
575  }
576 
577  double xp, yp, x2, y2, r2, r4, r6, k0, s0;
578  double xp_mod, yp_mod;
579 
580  if ( fx <= 0 ) fx = depth_width / 2;
581  if ( fy <= 0 ) fy = depth_height / 2;
582 
583  for ( int i=0; i< depth_height; i++ )
584  {
585  yp = ( i - cy ) / fy;
586  y2 = yp * yp;
587 
588  for ( int j=0; j < depth_width; j++ )
589  {
590  xp = ( j - cx ) / fx;
591  x2 = xp * xp;
592 
593  // Lens Distortion Correction
594  r2 = x2 + y2;
595  r4 = r2 * r2;
596  r6 = r2 * r4;
597  k0 = 1.0 + k1 * r2 + k2 * r4 + k3 * r6;
598  xp_mod = xp * k0 + 2.0 * p1 * xp * yp + p2 * ( r2 + 2.0 * x2 );
599  yp_mod = yp * k0 + 2.0 * p2 * xp * yp + p1 * ( r2 + 2.0 * y2 );
600 
601  s0 = sqrt( fabs( xp_mod * xp_mod + yp_mod * yp_mod + 1.0 ) );
602 
603  if ( s0 <= 0 ) s0 = 1.0;
604 
605  depth_data[ i*depth_width + j ] = (uint16_t)( floor( ( depth_data[ i*depth_width + j ] * depth_cnv_gain_ * 4.0 + depth_offset_ ) / s0 + 0.5 ) );
606 
607  }
608  }
609 
610  memcpy( &(image_depth->data[0]), depth_data, depth_width * depth_height * sizeof(uint16_t) );
611  memcpy( &(image_ir->data[0]), ir_data, depth_width * depth_height * sizeof(uint16_t) );
612 
613  }
614  else
615  {
616  return;
617  }
618 
619  image->header.frame_id = frame_id;
620  image->header.stamp = timestamp;
621 
622  image_ir->header.frame_id = frame_id_ir;
623  image_ir->header.stamp = timestamp;
624 
625  image_depth->header.frame_id = frame_id_depth;
626  image_depth->header.stamp = timestamp;
627 
628  image_bgr8->header.frame_id = frame_id_color;
629  image_bgr8->header.stamp = timestamp;
630 
631  cinfo->header.frame_id = frame_id;
632  cinfo->header.stamp = timestamp;
633 
634  cinfo_ir->header.frame_id = frame_id_ir;
635  cinfo_ir->header.stamp = timestamp;
636 
637  cinfo_depth->header.frame_id = frame_id_depth;
638  cinfo_depth->header.stamp = timestamp;
639 
640  cinfo_color->header.frame_id = frame_id_color;
641  cinfo_color->header.stamp = timestamp;
642 
643  pub_camera_.publish( image, cinfo );
644  pub_ir_.publish( image_ir, cinfo_ir );
645  pub_depth_.publish( image_depth, cinfo_depth );
646  pub_color_.publish( image_bgr8, cinfo_color );
647 
648 }
649 
650 
657 void CameraDriver::ImageCallbackAdapter( uvc_frame_t *frame, void *ptr )
658 {
659  CameraDriver *driver = static_cast<CameraDriver*>(ptr);
660 
661  driver->ImageCallback( frame );
662 }
663 
664 
668 void CameraDriver::OpenCamera()
669 {
670  int err;
671  int vendor_id = 0;
672  int product_id = 0;
673  int index_id = 0;
674 
675  std::string param_st;
676 
677  std::string serial_id = "0";
678 
679  err = priv_nh_.getParam( "vendor" , param_st );
680  vendor_id = strtol( param_st.c_str(), NULL, 0 );
681 
682  err = priv_nh_.getParam( "product", param_st );
683  product_id = strtol( param_st.c_str(), NULL, 0 );
684 
685  err = priv_nh_.getParam( "serial" , param_st );
686  serial_id = param_st;
687 
688  err = priv_nh_.getParam( "index" , param_st );
689  index_id = strtol( param_st.c_str(), NULL, 0 );
690 
691  ROS_INFO( "Opening camera with vendor=0x%x, product=0x%x, serial=\"%s\", index=%d",
692  vendor_id, product_id, serial_id.c_str(), index_id );
693 
694  uvc_device_t **devs;
695 
696  uvc_error_t find_err = uvc_find_devices(
697  ctx_, &devs,
698  vendor_id,
699  product_id,
700  serial_id.empty() ? NULL : serial_id.c_str() );
701 
702  if ( find_err != UVC_SUCCESS )
703  {
704  ROS_ERROR( "uvc_find_device : Error Num = %d", find_err );
705  return;
706  }
707 
708  // select device by index
709  dev_ = NULL;
710  int dev_idx = 0;
711  while ( devs[dev_idx] != NULL )
712  {
713  if ( dev_idx == index_id )
714  {
715  dev_ = devs[dev_idx];
716  }
717  else
718  {
719  uvc_unref_device( devs[dev_idx] );
720  }
721  dev_idx++;
722  }
723 
724  if ( dev_ == NULL )
725  {
726  ROS_ERROR( "Unable to find device at index %d", index_id );
727  return;
728  }
729 
730  uvc_error_t open_err = uvc_open( dev_, &devh_ );
731 
732  if ( open_err != UVC_SUCCESS )
733  {
734  int bus_num = uvc_get_bus_number( dev_ );
735  int dev_adr = uvc_get_device_address( dev_ );
736 
737  switch ( open_err )
738  {
739  case UVC_ERROR_ACCESS:
740  ROS_ERROR( "Permission denied opening /dev/bus/usb/%03d/%03d" , bus_num, dev_adr );
741  ROS_ERROR( "Please quit by 'Ctrl-C' and change the permission with 'sudo chmod o+x /dev/bus/usb/%03d/%03d'", bus_num, dev_adr );
742  break;
743  default:
744  ROS_ERROR( "Can't open /dev/bus/usb/%03d/%03d: %s (%d)", bus_num, dev_adr,
745  uvc_strerror( open_err ), open_err );
746  break;
747  }
748 
749  uvc_unref_device( dev_ );
750  return;
751  }
752 
753  int frame_width = 1920;
754  int frame_height = 960;
755  double frame_rate = 30.0;
756  std::string video_mode = "uncompressed";
757 
758  err = priv_nh_.getParam( "width" , frame_width );
759  err = priv_nh_.getParam( "height" , frame_height );
760  err = priv_nh_.getParam( "frame_rate" , frame_rate );
761  err = priv_nh_.getParam( "video_mode" , video_mode );
762 
763  uvc_stream_ctrl_t ctrl;
764 
765  uvc_error_t mode_err;
766  mode_err = uvc_get_stream_ctrl_format_size(
767  devh_, &ctrl,
768  UVC_COLOR_FORMAT_GRAY16,
769  frame_width, frame_height,
770  frame_rate );
771 
772  if ( mode_err != UVC_SUCCESS )
773  {
774  ROS_ERROR( "uvc_get_stream_ctrl_format_size" );
775  uvc_close( devh_ );
776  uvc_unref_device( dev_ );
777  ROS_ERROR( "check video_mode/width/height/frame_rate are available" );
778  uvc_print_diag( devh_, NULL );
779  return;
780  }
781 
782  uvc_error_t stream_err = uvc_start_streaming( devh_, &ctrl,
783  &CameraDriver::ImageCallbackAdapter,
784  this, 0 );
785 
786  if ( stream_err != UVC_SUCCESS )
787  {
788  ROS_ERROR( "uvc_start_streaming" );
789  uvc_close( devh_ );
790  uvc_unref_device( dev_ );
791  return;
792  }
793 
794  if ( rgb_frame_ )
795  uvc_free_frame( rgb_frame_ );
796 
797  rgb_frame_ = uvc_allocate_frame( frame_width * frame_height * 3 );
798 
799  cinfo_manager_.loadCameraInfo( camera_info_url_ );
800  cinfo_manager_ir_.loadCameraInfo( camera_info_url_ir_ );
801  cinfo_manager_depth_.loadCameraInfo( camera_info_url_depth_ );
802  cinfo_manager_color_.loadCameraInfo( camera_info_url_color_ );
803 
804  // TOF Camera Settigns
805  int tof_err;
806 // tof_err = setToFEEPROMMode( TOF_EEPROM_FACTORY_DEFAULT );
807 // tof_err = clearToFError();
808  setToFMode_All();
809 
810  // Get TOF & RGB Camera Informations
811  getToFInfo_All();
812  getRGBInfo_All();
813 
814  // Set Timer for Publishing Temperatures
815  double temp_time = 0.0;
816  err = priv_nh_.getParam( "temp_time", temp_time );
817  if ( 0.0 < temp_time )
818  {
819  ROS_INFO( "Set Timer for Publishing Temperatures as %.3f [sec]", temp_time );
820  temp_timer_ = nh_.createTimer( ros::Duration( temp_time ),
821  boost::bind( &CameraDriver::TemperatureCallback, this ) );
822  }
823 
824  tof_err = clearToFError();
825 
826  err = priv_nh_.getParam( "r_gain", r_gain_ );
827  err = priv_nh_.getParam( "g_gain", g_gain_ );
828  err = priv_nh_.getParam( "b_gain", b_gain_ );
829 
830  state_ = Running;
831 }
832 
833 
841 int CameraDriver::setCameraCtrl( uint8_t ctrl, uint16_t *data ,int size )
842 {
843  int err;
844 
845  err = uvc_set_ctrl( devh_, 3, ctrl, data, size );
846  if ( err != size )
847  {
848  ROS_ERROR( "Set Ctrl failed. Error: %d", err );
849  }
850  return err;
851 }
852 
853 
861 int CameraDriver::getCameraCtrl( uint8_t ctrl, uint16_t *data, int size )
862 {
863  int err;
864 
865  err = setCameraCtrl( ctrl, data, size );
866  if ( err != size )
867  {
868  ROS_ERROR( "Set Ctrl to Get failed : Error: %d", err );
869  return err;
870  }
871  else
872  {
873  err = uvc_get_ctrl( devh_, 3, ctrl, data, size, UVC_GET_CUR );
874  if ( err != size )
875  {
876  ROS_ERROR( "Get Ctrl failed. Error: %d", err );
877  }
878  }
879  return err;
880 }
881 
886 int CameraDriver::setToFMode_All()
887 {
888  int err;
889 
890  // Set RGB White Balance
891  err = setToFMode_ROSParameter( "white_balance", 0 );
892 
893  // Set Depth/IR & RGB Parameters
894  std::string rosparam_names[10] =
895  {
896  "depth_range",
897  "threshold",
898  "nr_filter",
899  "pulse_count",
900  "ld_enable",
901  "ir_gain",
902  "ae_mode",
903  "brightness_gain",
904  "exposure_time",
905  "color_correction"
906  };
907  std::string param_name;
908 
909  int param;
910  int name_num = sizeof( rosparam_names ) / sizeof( rosparam_names[0] );
911 
912  for ( int i = 0; i < name_num ; i++ )
913  {
914  param_name = rosparam_names[i];
915 
916  int err = 0;
917 
918  // Get ROS Parameter and Set Data
919  if ( priv_nh_.getParam( param_name, param ) )
920  {
921  err = setToFMode_ROSParameter( param_name, param );
922  }
923  else
924  {
925  ROS_ERROR( "Parameter Acquisition Error : %s", param_name.c_str() );
926  return err;
927  }
928  }
929 
930  return err;
931 }
932 
939 int CameraDriver::setToFMode_ROSParameter( std::string param_name, double param )
940 {
941  int err = 0;
942 
943  uint32_t param_ui0 = 0;
944  uint16_t param_ui1 = 0;
945  uint16_t param_ui2 = 0;
946 
947  if ( param_name == "brightness_gain" )
948  {
949  param_ui0 = (uint32_t)( fabs( param ) * 100.0 );
950  }
951  else if ( param_name == "exposure_time" )
952  {
953  param_ui0 = (uint32_t)( fabs( param ) * 0x00100000 );
954  }
955  else
956  {
957  return err;
958  }
959 
960  param_ui1 = (uint16_t)( param_ui0 & 0xFFFF );
961  param_ui2 = (uint16_t)( ( param_ui0 >> 16 ) & 0xFFFF );
962  err = setToFMode_ROSParameter( param_name, param_ui1, param_ui2 );
963 
964  return err;
965 }
966 
973 int CameraDriver::setToFMode_ROSParameter( std::string param_name, int param )
974 {
975  int err;
976 
977  err = setToFMode_ROSParameter( param_name, param, 0 );
978  return err;
979 }
980 
988 int CameraDriver::setToFMode_ROSParameter( std::string param_name, int param, int param_2 )
989 {
990  uint8_t ctrl = UVC_XU_CTRL_TOF;
991 
992  uint16_t send[5] = { TOF_SET_DEPTH_RANGE, 0, 0, 0, 0 };
993  uint16_t recv[5] = { TOF_GET_DEPTH_RANGE, 0, 0, 0, 0 };
994 
995  int param_set[5] = { TOF_SET_DEPTH_RANGE, 0, 0, 0, 0 };
996  int param_min[5] = { 0x0000, 0, 0, 0, 0 };
997  int param_max[5] = { 0xFFFF, 1, 1, 1, 1 };
998 
999  int err = 0;
1000 
1001  // Set Parameter MAX/min and ToF Process Number
1002  if ( param_name == "depth_range" )
1003  {
1004  param_set[0] = TOF_SET_DEPTH_RANGE;
1005  param_set[1] = param;
1006 
1007  param_min[1] = 0;
1008  param_max[1] = 2;
1009 
1010  recv[0] = TOF_GET_DEPTH_RANGE;
1011  }
1012  else if ( param_name == "threshold" )
1013  {
1014  param_set[0] = TOF_SET_THRESHOLD;
1015  param_set[1] = param;
1016 
1017  param_min[1] = 0x0000;
1018  param_max[1] = 0x3FFF;
1019 
1020  recv[0] = TOF_GET_THRESHOLD;
1021  }
1022  else if ( param_name == "nr_filter" )
1023  {
1024  param_set[0] = TOF_SET_NR_FILTER;
1025  param_set[1] = param;
1026 
1027  param_min[1] = 0;
1028  param_max[1] = 1;
1029 
1030  recv[0] = TOF_GET_NR_FILTER;
1031  }
1032  else if ( param_name == "pulse_count" )
1033  {
1034  param_set[0] = TOF_SET_PULSE_COUNT;
1035  param_set[1] = param;
1036 
1037  param_min[1] = 1;
1038  param_max[1] = 2000;
1039 
1040  recv[0] = TOF_GET_PULSE_COUNT;
1041  }
1042  else if ( param_name == "ld_enable" )
1043  {
1044  param_set[0] = TOF_SET_LD_ENABLE;
1045  param_set[1] = param;
1046  param_set[2] = param;
1047 
1048  param_min[1] = 0;
1049  param_max[1] = 3;
1050  param_min[2] = 0;
1051  param_max[2] = 3;
1052 
1053  recv[0] = TOF_GET_LD_ENABLE;
1054  }
1055  else if ( param_name == "ir_gain" )
1056  {
1057  param_set[0] = TOF_SET_IR_GAIN;
1058  param_set[1] = param;
1059 
1060  param_min[1] = 0;
1061  param_max[1] = 0x07FF;
1062 
1063  recv[0] = TOF_GET_IR_GAIN;
1064  }
1065  else if ( param_name == "white_balance" )
1066  {
1067  ctrl = UVC_XU_CTRL_RGB;
1068  param_set[0] = RGB_SET_WHITE_BALANCE;
1069  }
1070  else if ( param_name == "ae_mode" )
1071  {
1072  ctrl = UVC_XU_CTRL_RGB;
1073  param_set[0] = RGB_SET_AE_MODE;
1074  param_set[1] = param;
1075 
1076  param_min[1] = 0;
1077  param_max[1] = 3;
1078 
1079  recv[0] = RGB_GET_AE_MODE;
1080  }
1081  else if ( param_name == "brightness_gain" )
1082  {
1083  ctrl = UVC_XU_CTRL_RGB;
1084  param_set[0] = RGB_SET_BRIGHTNESS_GAIN;
1085  param_set[1] = param;
1086  param_set[2] = param_2;
1087 
1088  param_min[1] = 100;
1089  param_max[1] = 1067;
1090  param_min[2] = 0;
1091  param_max[2] = 0xFFFF;
1092 
1093  recv[0] = RGB_GET_BRIGHTNESS_GAIN;
1094  }
1095  else if ( param_name == "exposure_time" )
1096  {
1097  ctrl = UVC_XU_CTRL_RGB;
1098  param_set[0] = RGB_SET_SHUTTER_CONTROL;
1099  param_set[1] = param;
1100  param_set[2] = param_2;
1101 
1102  param_min[1] = 0x0069;
1103  param_max[1] = 0x28F6;
1104  param_min[2] = 0;
1105  param_max[2] = 0xFFFF;
1106 
1107  recv[0] = RGB_GET_SHUTTER_CONTROL;
1108  }
1109  else if ( param_name == "color_correction" )
1110  {
1111  ctrl = UVC_XU_CTRL_RGB;
1112  param_set[0] = RGB_SET_COLOR_CORRECTION;
1113  param_set[1] = param;
1114 
1115  param_min[1] = 0;
1116  param_max[1] = 1;
1117 
1118  recv[0] = RGB_GET_COLOR_CORRECTION;
1119  }
1120  else
1121  {
1122  ROS_WARN( "Unmatch Parameter Name : %s", param_name.c_str() );
1123  err = 0;
1124  return err;
1125  }
1126 
1127  // Max/min Value Check
1128  for ( int i = 0; i < 5; i++ )
1129  {
1130  if ( param_set[i] < param_min[i] ) send[i] = param_min[i];
1131  else if ( param_max[i] < param_set[i] ) send[i] = param_max[i];
1132  else send[i] = param_set[i];
1133  }
1134 
1135  // Set Parameter on TOF Camera
1136  err = setCameraCtrl( ctrl, send, sizeof(send) );
1137  if ( err == sizeof(send) )
1138  {
1139  ROS_INFO( "Set Parameter %s as { %d, %d, %d, %d } on TOF Camera",
1140  param_name.c_str(), send[1], send[2], send[3], send[4] );
1141  }
1142  else
1143  {
1144  ROS_ERROR( "Set Parameter %s failed. Error: %d", param_name.c_str(), err );
1145  return err;
1146  }
1147 
1148  if ( param_name == "depth_range" )
1149  {
1150  getToFDepthCnvGain( depth_cnv_gain_ );
1151  ROS_INFO( "Get Depth Cnv Gain : %f", depth_cnv_gain_ );
1152 
1153  unsigned short max_data;
1154  unsigned short min_dist;
1155  unsigned short max_dist;
1156  getToFDepthInfo( depth_offset_, max_data, min_dist, max_dist );
1157  ROS_INFO( "Get Depth Info - Offset: %d / Max Data : %d / min Distance : %d [mm] MAX Distance :%d [mm]",
1158  depth_offset_, max_data, min_dist, max_dist );
1159  }
1160 
1161  // Check the valid values on ToF Camera
1162  if ( param_name == "pulse_count" || param_name == "depth_range" )
1163  {
1164  uint16_t pulse_count;
1165  getToFPulseCount( pulse_count );
1166  }
1167 
1168  return err;
1169 }
1170 
1176 int CameraDriver::setToFEEPROMMode( uint16_t mode = TOF_EEPROM_FACTORY_DEFAULT )
1177 {
1178  uint8_t ctrl = UVC_XU_CTRL_TOF;
1179  uint16_t send[5] = { TOF_SET_EEPROM, 0, 0, 0, 0 };
1180  int err;
1181 
1182  uint16_t val_min = 0x0000;
1183  uint16_t val_max = 0x0001;
1184 
1185  // Value Check
1186  if ( mode < val_min ) send[1] = val_min;
1187  else if ( val_max < mode ) send[1] = val_max;
1188  else send[1] = mode;
1189 
1190  err = setCameraCtrl( ctrl, send, sizeof(send) );
1191  if ( err == sizeof(send) )
1192  {
1193  ROS_INFO( "Set EEPROM Mode : %d", send[1] );
1194  }
1195  else
1196  {
1197  ROS_ERROR( "Set EEPROM Mode failed. Error: %d", err );
1198  return err;
1199  }
1200 
1201  return err;
1202 }
1203

1209 int CameraDriver::clearToFError()
1210 {
1211  uint8_t ctrl = UVC_XU_CTRL_TOF;
1212  uint16_t send[5] = { TOF_SET_ERROR_CLEAR, 0, 0, 0, 0 };
1213  int err;
1214 
1215  err = setCameraCtrl( ctrl, send, sizeof(send) );
1216  if ( err == sizeof(send) )
1217  {
1218  ROS_INFO( "Clear TOF Camera Errors" );
1219  }
1220  else
1221  {
1222  ROS_ERROR( "Clear TOF Camera Errors failed. Error: %d", err );
1223  return err;
1224  }
1225 
1226  return err;
1227 }

1229 
1233 void CameraDriver::getToFInfo_All()
1234 {
1235  int tof_err;
1236 
1237  // Get TOF Camera Informations
1238 
1239  uint16_t version_n;
1240  uint16_t build_n;
1241  uint16_t build_y;
1242  uint16_t build_d;
1243  tof_err = getToFVersion( version_n, build_n, build_y, build_d );
1244 
1245  uint16_t depth_range;
1246  uint16_t dr_index;
1247  tof_err = getToFDepthRange( depth_range, dr_index );
1248 
1249  uint16_t threshold;
1250  tof_err = getToFThreshold( threshold );
1251 
1252  uint16_t nr_filter;
1253  tof_err = getToFNRFilter( nr_filter );
1254 
1255  uint16_t pulse_count;
1256  tof_err = getToFPulseCount( pulse_count );
1257 
1258  uint16_t ld_enable_near;
1259  uint16_t ld_enable_wide;
1260  tof_err = getToFLDEnable( ld_enable_near, ld_enable_wide );
1261 
1262  depth_cnv_gain_ = 0.5;
1263  tof_err = getToFDepthCnvGain( depth_cnv_gain_ );
1264  ROS_INFO( "Get Depth Cnv Gain : %f", depth_cnv_gain_ );
1265 
1266  unsigned short max_data;
1267  unsigned short min_dist;
1268  unsigned short max_dist;
1269  tof_err = getToFDepthInfo( depth_offset_, max_data, min_dist, max_dist );
1270  ROS_INFO( "Get Depth Info - Offset: %d / Max Data : %d / min Distance : %d [mm] MAX Distance :%d [mm]",
1271  depth_offset_, max_data, min_dist, max_dist );
1272 
1273  uint16_t ir_gain;
1274  tof_err = getToFIRGain( ir_gain );
1275 
1276  double t1;
1277  double t2;
1278  tof_err = getToFTemperature( t1, t2 );
1279  ROS_INFO( "Get Temperature T1 : %.1f / T2 : %.1f [deg C]", t1, t2 );
1280 
1281  int time_near, time_wide;
1282  tof_err = getToFLDPulseWidth( time_near, time_wide );
1283  ROS_INFO( "Get LD Pulse Width - Near: %d / Wide: %d [ns]", time_near, time_near );
1284 
1285  uint16_t common_err;
1286  uint16_t eeprom_err_factory;
1287  uint16_t eeprom_err;
1288  uint16_t mipi_temp_err;
1289  tof_err = getToFErrorInfo( common_err, eeprom_err_factory, eeprom_err, mipi_temp_err );
1290 
1291  return;
1292 }

1301 int CameraDriver::getToFDepthRange( uint16_t& depth_range, uint16_t& dr_index )
1302 {
1303  uint8_t ctrl = UVC_XU_CTRL_TOF;
1304  uint16_t data[5] = { TOF_GET_DEPTH_RANGE, 0, 0, 0, 0 };
1305  int err;
1306 
1307  err = getCameraCtrl( ctrl, data, sizeof(data) );
1308  if ( err == sizeof(data) )
1309  {
1310  depth_range = data[1];
1311  dr_index = data[2];
1312  ROS_INFO( "Get Depth Range Mode : %d / Index : %d", depth_range, dr_index );
1313  }
1314  else
1315  {
1316  ROS_ERROR( "Get Depth Range Mode failed. Error : %d", err );
1317  }
1318 
1319  return err;
1320 }

1335  if ( err == sizeof(data) )
1336  {

1338  ROS_INFO( "Get Threshold : %d", threshold );
1339  }
1340  else
1341  {
1342  ROS_ERROR( "Get Threshold failed. Error : %d", err );
1343  }
1344 
1345  return err;
1346 }

1374 
1380 int CameraDriver::getToFPulseCount( uint16_t& pulse_count )
1381 {
1382  uint8_t ctrl = UVC_XU_CTRL_TOF;
1383  uint16_t data[5] = { TOF_GET_PULSE_COUNT, 0, 0, 0, 0 };
1384  int err;
1385 
1386  err = getCameraCtrl( ctrl, data, sizeof(data) );
1387  if ( err == sizeof(data) )
1388  {
1389  pulse_count = data[1];
1390  ROS_INFO( "Get Pulse Count : %d", pulse_count );
1391  }
1392  else
1393  {

1406 int CameraDriver::getToFLDEnable( uint16_t& ld_enable_near, uint16_t& ld_enable_wide )
1407 {
1408  uint8_t ctrl = UVC_XU_CTRL_TOF;
1409  uint16_t data[5] = { TOF_GET_LD_ENABLE, 0, 0, 0, 0 };
1410  int err;
1411 
1412  err = getCameraCtrl( ctrl, data, sizeof(data) );
1413  if ( err == sizeof(data) )
1414  {
1415  ld_enable_near = data[1];
1416  ld_enable_wide = data[2];
1417  ROS_INFO( "Get LD Enable - Near: %d Wide: %d", ld_enable_near, ld_enable_wide );
1418  }
1419  else
1420  {
1421  ROS_ERROR( "Get LD Enable failed. Error : %d", err );
1422  }
1423 
1424  return err;
1425 }

1519 int CameraDriver::getToFTemperature( double& t1, double& t2 )
1520 {
1521  uint8_t ctrl = UVC_XU_CTRL_TOF;
1522  uint16_t data[5] = { TOF_GET_TEMPERATURE, 0, 0, 0, 0 };
1523  int err;
1524 
1525  err = getCameraCtrl( ctrl, data, sizeof(data) );
1526  if ( err == sizeof(data) )
1527  {
1528  t1 = data[1] / 256.0;
1529  t2 = data[2] / 256.0;
1530  }
1531  else
1532  {
1533  ROS_ERROR( "Get Temperature failed. Error: %d", err );
1534  }
1535 
1536  return err;
1537 }

1611 int CameraDriver::getToFErrorInfo( uint16_t& common_err,
1612  uint16_t& eeprom_err_factory,
1613  uint16_t& eeprom_err,
1614  uint16_t& mipi_temp_err )
1615 {

1617  uint16_t data[5] = { TOF_GET_ERROR_INFO, 0, 0, 0, 0 };
1618  int err;
1619 
1620  err = getCameraCtrl( ctrl, data, sizeof(data) );
1621  if ( err == sizeof(data) )
1622  {
1623  common_err = data[1];
1624  eeprom_err_factory = data[2];
1625  eeprom_err = data[3];
1626  mipi_temp_err = data[4];
1627  ROS_INFO( "Get Error Info - Common : 0x%02x / EEPROM Factory : 0x%02x / EEPROM : 0x%02x / Misc-Temperature : 0x%02x",
1628  common_err, eeprom_err_factory, eeprom_err, mipi_temp_err );
1629  }
1630  else
1631  {
1632  ROS_ERROR( "Get Error Info failed. Error: %d", err );
1633  }
1634 
1635  return err;

1642 void CameraDriver::getRGBInfo_All()
1643 {
1644  int err;
1645 
1646  uint16_t ae_mode;
1647  err = getRGBAEMode( ae_mode );
1648 
1649  double brightness_gain;
1650  double brightness_maxg;

1654  double exposure_maxt;
1655  err = getRGBShutterControl( exposure_time, exposure_maxt );
1656 
1657  uint16_t color_correction;
1658  err = getRGBColorCorrection( color_correction );
1659 
1660  return;
1661 }

1675 
1676  err = getCameraCtrl( ctrl, data, sizeof(data) );
1677  if ( err == sizeof(data) )
1678  {
1679  ae_mode = data[1];
1680  ROS_INFO( "Get RGB AE Mode: %d ( 0:Manual / 1: Gain Auto / 2: Shutter Auto / 3: Full Auto )", ae_mode );

1696 int CameraDriver::getRGBBrightnessGain( double& brightness_gain, double& brightness_maxg )
1697 {
1698  int err;
1699 
1700  uint8_t ctrl = UVC_XU_CTRL_RGB;
1701  uint16_t data[5] = { RGB_GET_BRIGHTNESS_GAIN, 0, 0, 0, 0 };
1702 
1703  err = getCameraCtrl( ctrl, data, sizeof(data) );
1704  if ( err == sizeof(data) )
1705  {
1706  uint32_t gain = ( data[2] << 16 ) + data[1];
1707  uint32_t maxg = ( data[4] << 16 ) + data[3];
1708 
1709  brightness_gain = (double)(gain) / 100.0;
1710  brightness_maxg = (double)(maxg) / 100.0;
1711 
1712  ROS_INFO( "Get RGB Brightness Gain: %f ( MAX: %f )", brightness_gain, brightness_maxg );
1713  }
1714  else
1715  {
1716  ROS_ERROR( "Get Error Info failed. Error: %d", err );
1717  }
1718 
1719  return err;
1720 }
1721 
1728 int CameraDriver::getRGBShutterControl( double& exposure_time, double& exposure_maxt )
1729 {
1730  int err;
1731 
1732  uint8_t ctrl = UVC_XU_CTRL_RGB;
1733  uint16_t data[5] = { RGB_GET_SHUTTER_CONTROL, 0, 0, 0, 0 };
1734 
1735  err = getCameraCtrl( ctrl, data, sizeof(data) );
1736  if ( err == sizeof(data) )
1737  {
1738  uint32_t time = ( data[2] << 16 ) + data[1];
1739  uint32_t maxt = ( data[4] << 16 ) + data[3];
1740 
1741  exposure_time = (double)(time) / 0x00100000;
1742  exposure_maxt = (double)(maxt) / 0x00100000;
1743 
1744  ROS_INFO( "Get RGB Exposure Time: %f (MAX: %f) [sec]", exposure_time, exposure_maxt );
1745  }
1746  else
1747  {
1748  ROS_ERROR( "Get Error Info failed. Error: %d", err );
1749  }
1750 
1751  return err;
1752 }

1771  }
1772  else
1773  {
1774  ROS_ERROR( "Get Error Info failed. Error: %d", err );
1775  }
1776 
1777  return err;

1784 void CameraDriver::TemperatureCallback( void* ptr )
1785 {
1786  boost::recursive_mutex::scoped_lock( mutex_ );
1787 
1788  CameraDriver *driver = static_cast<CameraDriver*>(ptr);
1789 
1790  driver->publishToFTemperature();
1791 
1792  return;
1793 }
1794 
1795 
1799 void CameraDriver::publishToFTemperature()
1800 {
1801  std::string frame_id;
1802  priv_nh_.getParam( "frame_id" , frame_id );
1803 
1804  sensor_msgs::Temperature t_msg;
1805 
1806  double t1;
1807  double t2;
1808 
1809  getToFTemperature( t1, t2 );
1810 
1811  t_msg.header.frame_id = frame_id;
1812  t_msg.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
1813 
1814  t_msg.temperature = t1;
1815  pub_tof_t1_.publish( t_msg );
1816 
1817  t_msg.temperature = t2;
1818  pub_tof_t2_.publish( t_msg );
1819 
1820  return;
1821 }
1822 
1823 
1827 void CameraDriver::CloseCamera()
1828 {
1829  uvc_close( devh_ );
1830  devh_ = NULL;
1831 
1832  uvc_unref_device( dev_ );
1833  dev_ = NULL;
1834 
1835  temp_timer_.stop();
1836 
1837  state_ = Stopped;
1838 }
1839 
1840 };
